meanings.definition: Clothing worn under outer garments, typically next to the skin.
meanings.sent1: She packed her underclothings before her trip to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: He always wears clean underclothings to feel comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The underclothings were so cozy, she almost forgot to put on her outer clothes.
meanings.sent4: His underclothings were like a shield protecting him from the cold.
meanings.sent5: The soft underclothings hugged her skin gently.

meanings.definition: Articles of clothing worn under other garments, such as underwear or undershirts.
meanings.sent1: She bought new underclothings to match her outfit.
meanings.sent2: He folded his underclothings neatly in the drawer.
meanings.sent3: The underclothings peeked out from his pants, causing a giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her colorful underclothings added a pop of fun to her attire.
meanings.sent5: The underclothings were like a secret only she knew.
